name: Surfing 'n' Cleaning
description:
You helping penguin to clean up ocean from trash!

The game is available only online on web and offline(downloadable) for Windows right now. Downloadable for Mac and Linux will come later!

Credits:

Music & Sounds by KevinMacLeod, FreeSoundsLibrary & Little Robot Sound Factory

Graphics by OmegaTheYellow & PolyMars(SeaJam Logo)
